result.eng: Strangely enough, she got her education in England and not in Ireland.
result.ga: Aisteach go leor ba i Sasana a fuair sí a cuid scolaíochta agus ní in Éirinn

result.ponchtml: Aisteaċ go leor ba i Sasana a fuair sí a cuid scolaíoċta agus ní in ÉirinnStrangely enough, she got her education in England and not in Ireland.

result.eng: Have you got any news?
result.ga: An bhfuil aon scéal agat
result.orig: An bhfuil aon scéal agat
result.html: An bhfuil aon scéal agatHave you got any news?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil aon scéal agatHave you got any news?

result.eng: Have you got any change?
result.ga: An bhfuil briseadh agat

result.html: An bhfuil briseadh agatHave you got any change?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil briseaḋ agatHave you got any change?

result.eng: Have you got children?
result.ga: An bhfuil clann agat
result.orig: An bhfuil clann agat
result.html: An bhfuil clann agatHave you got children?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil clann agatHave you got children?

result.eng: Have you got any news?

result.html: An bhfuil scéal ar bith agatHave you got any news?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil scéal ar biṫ agatHave you got any news?

result.eng: The money I got wouldn't even pay the rent for me.
result.ga: An t-airgead a fuair mé ní íocfadh sé an cíos dom fiú
result.orig: An t-airgead a fuair mé ní íocfadh sé an cíos dom fiú
result.html: An t-airgead a fuair mé ní íocfadh sé an cíos dom fiúThe money I got wouldn't even pay the rent for me.
result.ponchtml: An t-airgead a fuair mé ní íocfaḋ sé an cíos dom fiúThe money I got wouldn't even pay the rent for me.

result.eng: The father from whom he got that habit.
result.ga: An t-athair ónar thóg sé an nós sin
result.orig: An t-athair ónar thóg sé an nós sin
result.html: An t-athair ónar thóg sé an nós sinThe father from whom he got that habit.
result.ponchtml: An t-aṫair ónar ṫóg sé an nós sinThe father from whom he got that habit.

result.eng: I got the idea while getting up in the morning.
result.ga: Bhuail an smaoineamh mé ar éirí ar maidin dom
result.orig: Bhuail an smaoineamh mé ar éirí ar maidin dom
result.html: Bhuail an smaoineamh mé ar éirí ar maidin domI got the idea while getting up in the morning.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail an smaoineaṁ mé ar éirí ar maidin domI got the idea while getting up in the morning.

result.eng: He got a heart attack.
result.ga: Bhuail taom croí é
result.orig: Bhuail taom croí é
result.html: Bhuail taom croí éHe got a heart attack.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail taom croí éHe got a heart attack.

result.eng: I was lucky that I got the job.
result.ga: Bhí an t-ádh orm go bhfuair mé an post
result.orig: Bhí an t-ádh orm go bhfuair mé an post
result.html: Bhí an t-ádh orm go bhfuair mé an postI was lucky that I got the job.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an t-áḋ orm go ḃfuair mé an postI was lucky that I got the job.

result.eng: You must speak good Irish if you got a job in Raidió na Gaeltachta.
result.ga: Caithfidh go bhfuil Gaeilge mhaith agat nuair a fuair tú post ar Raidió na Gaeltachta
result.orig: Caithfidh go bhfuil Gaeilge mhaith agat nuair a fuair tú post ar Raidió na Gaeltachta
result.html: Caithfidh go bhfuil Gaeilge mhaith agat nuair a fuair tú post ar Raidió na GaeltachtaYou must speak good Irish if you got a job in Raidió na Gaeltachta.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ go ḃfuil Gaeilge ṁaiṫ agat nuair a fuair tú post ar Raidió na GaeltaċtaYou must speak good Irish if you got a job in Raidió na Gaeltachta.

result.eng: I got down to work.
result.ga: Chrom mé ar an obair
result.orig: Chrom mé ar an obair
result.html: Chrom mé ar an obairI got down to work.
result.ponchtml: Ċrom mé ar an obairI got down to work.

result.eng: How many have you got? - Three.
result.ga: Cá mhéad atá agat - Trí cinn
result.orig: Cá mhéad atá agat - Trí cinn
result.html: Cá mhéad atá agat - Trí cinnHow many have you got? - Three.
result.ponchtml: Cá ṁéad atá agat - Trí cinnHow many have you got? - Three.

result.eng: She left him after she got her satisfaction from him.
result.ga: D'fhág sí é i ndiaidh di sásamh a bhaint as
result.orig: D'fhág sí é i ndiaidh di sásamh a bhaint as
result.html: D'fhág sí é i ndiaidh di sásamh a bhaint asShe left him after she got her satisfaction from him.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág sí é i ndiaiḋ di sásaṁ a ḃaint asShe left him after she got her satisfaction from him.

result.eng: I got up at eight in the morning.
result.ga: D'éirigh mé ar a hocht a chlog ar maidin
result.orig: D'éirigh mé ar a hocht a chlog ar maidin
result.html: D'éirigh mé ar a hocht a chlog ar maidinI got up at eight in the morning.
result.ponchtml: D'éiriġ mé ar a hoċt a ċlog ar maidinI got up at eight in the morning.

result.eng: We got a fine present from Liam.
result.ga: Fuair muid bronntanas breá ó Liam
result.orig: Fuair muid bronntanas breá ó Liam
result.html: Fuair muid bronntanas breá ó LiamWe got a fine present from Liam.
result.ponchtml: Fuair muid bronntanas breá ó LiamWe got a fine present from Liam.

result.eng: We got an order from the general.
result.ga: Fuair muid ordú ón ghinearál
result.orig: Fuair muid ordú ón ghinearál
result.html: Fuair muid ordú ón ghinearálWe got an order from the general.
result.ponchtml: Fuair muid ordú ón ġinearálWe got an order from the general.

result.eng: I got the job because of the experience I had.
result.ga: Fuair mé an jab i ngeall ar an taithí a bhí agam
result.orig: Fuair mé an jab i ngeall ar an taithí a bhí agam
result.html: Fuair mé an jab i ngeall ar an taithí a bhí agamI got the job because of the experience I had.
result.ponchtml: Fuair mé an jab i ngeall ar an taiṫí a ḃí agamI got the job because of the experience I had.

result.eng: I got a call from the journalist.
result.ga: Fuair mé glaoch ón iriseoir
result.orig: Fuair mé glaoch ón iriseoir
result.html: Fuair mé glaoch ón iriseoirI got a call from the journalist.
result.ponchtml: Fuair mé glaoċ ón iriseoirI got a call from the journalist.

result.eng: I got a day off.
result.ga: Fuair mé lá saoire
result.orig: Fuair mé lá saoire
result.html: Fuair mé lá saoireI got a day off.
result.ponchtml: Fuair mé lá saoireI got a day off.

result.eng: They got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.
result.ga: Fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán te
result.orig: Fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán te
result.html: Fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán teThey got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.
result.ponchtml: Fuair siad faoiseaṁ ón ḃfuaċt nuair a ċuir siad a láṁa timpeall na gcupán teThey got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.

result.eng: She got a wonderful present.
result.ga: Fuair sí bronntanas iontach
result.orig: Fuair sí bronntanas iontach
result.html: Fuair sí bronntanas iontachShe got a wonderful present.
result.ponchtml: Fuair sí bronntanas iontaċShe got a wonderful present.

result.eng: She got a car as a present.
result.ga: Fuair sí carr mar bhronntanas
result.orig: Fuair sí carr mar bhronntanas
result.html: Fuair sí carr mar bhronntanasShe got a car as a present.
result.ponchtml: Fuair sí carr mar ḃronntanasShe got a car as a present.

result.eng: She kept on complaining until she got an answer.
result.ga: Lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagra
result.orig: Lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagra
result.html: Lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagraShe kept on complaining until she got an answer.
result.ponchtml: Lean sí ag gearán léi go ḃfuair sí freagraShe kept on complaining until she got an answer.

result.eng: I only got one.
result.ga: Ní bhfuair mé ach ceann amháin
result.orig: Ní bhfuair mé ach ceann amháin
result.html: Ní bhfuair mé ach ceann amháinI only got one.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair mé aċ ceann aṁáinI only got one.

result.eng: She got no money from me.
result.ga: Ní bhfuair sí aon airgead uaim
result.orig: Ní bhfuair sí aon airgead uaim
result.html: Ní bhfuair sí aon airgead uaimShe got no money from me.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair sí aon airgead uaimShe got no money from me.

result.eng: I got down to writing the essay and I had it finished in two hours.
result.ga: Thug mé faoin aiste agus bhí sí críochnaithe agam i gceann dhá uair an chloig
result.orig: Thug mé faoin aiste agus bhí sí críochnaithe agam i gceann dhá uair an chloig
result.html: Thug mé faoin aiste agus bhí sí críochnaithe agam i gceann dhá uair an chloigI got down to writing the essay and I had it finished in two hours.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug mé faoin aiste agus ḃí sí críoċnaiṫe agam i gceann ḋá uair an ċloigI got down to writing the essay and I had it finished in two hours.

result.eng: We got a package in the post.
result.ga: Tháinig beart sa phost
result.orig: Tháinig beart sa phost
result.html: Tháinig beart sa phostWe got a package in the post.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig beart sa ṗostWe got a package in the post.

result.eng: She gave me a prescription and I got the medicine in the pharmacy but the medicine makes me tired.
result.ga: Thug sí oideas dom agus fuair mé an cógas sa gcógaslann ach cuireann an cógas sin tuirse orm
result.orig: Thug sí oideas dom agus fuair mé an cógas sa gcógaslann ach cuireann an cógas sin tuirse orm
result.html: Thug sí oideas dom agus fuair mé an cógas sa gcógaslann ach cuireann an cógas sin tuirse ormShe gave me a prescription and I got the medicine in the pharmacy but the medicine makes me tired.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug sí oideas dom agus fuair mé an cógas sa gcógaslann aċ cuireann an cógas sin tuirse ormShe gave me a prescription and I got the medicine in the pharmacy but the medicine makes me tired.

result.eng: I've got two tickets.
result.ga: Tá dhá thicéad agam
result.orig: Tá dhá thicéad agam
result.html: Tá dhá thicéad agamI've got two tickets.
result.ponchtml: Tá ḋá ṫicéad agamI've got two tickets.

result.eng: I was afraid you'd got lost!
result.ga: Bhí faitíos orm go raibh tú imithe amú
result.orig: Bhí faitíos orm go raibh tú imithe amú
result.html: Bhí faitíos orm go raibh tú imithe amúI was afraid you'd got lost!
result.ponchtml: Ḃí faitíos orm go raiḃ tú imiṫe amúI was afraid you'd got lost!

result.eng: Some of the horses got scared.
result.ga: Tháinig eagla ar chuid de na capaill
result.orig: Tháinig eagla ar chuid de na capaill
result.html: Tháinig eagla ar chuid de na capaillSome of the horses got scared.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig eagla ar ċuid de na capaillSome of the horses got scared.

result.eng: Some ten years ago I got up from bed in a small apartment.
result.ga: Beagnach deich mbliana ó shin d'éirigh mé as an leaba in árasán beag
result.orig: Beagnach deich mbliana ó shin d'éirigh mé as an leaba in árasán beag
result.html: Beagnach deich mbliana ó shin d'éirigh mé as an leaba in árasán beagSome ten years ago I got up from bed in a small apartment.
result.ponchtml: Beagnaċ deiċ mbliana ó ẛin d'éiriġ mé as an leaba in árasán beagSome ten years ago I got up from bed in a small apartment.

result.eng: Some writers got very little feedback on their blogs.
result.ga: Is beag aischothú a fuair scríbhneoirí áirithe ar a gcuid blaganna
result.orig: Is beag aischothú a fuair scríbhneoirí áirithe ar a gcuid blaganna
result.html: Is beag aischothú a fuair scríbhneoirí áirithe ar a gcuid blagannaSome writers got very little feedback on their blogs.
result.ponchtml: Is beag aisċoṫú a fuair scríḃneoirí áiriṫe ar a gcuid blagannaSome writers got very little feedback on their blogs.

result.eng: Also, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
result.ga: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóirí
result.orig: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóirí
result.html: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóiríAlso, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁinic fosta gur maslaí ó ḋaoine le hainmneaċa cleite a ḃíoḋ mar ṫoraḋ ar na tuairimí a noċt blagadóiríAlso, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.

result.eng: She got hold of the microphone and started singing.
result.ga: Ghlac sí seilbh ar an micreafón agus thosaigh sí ag canadh
result.orig: Ghlac sí seilbh ar an micreafón agus thosaigh sí ag canadh
result.html: Ghlac sí seilbh ar an micreafón agus thosaigh sí ag canadhShe got hold of the microphone and started singing.
result.ponchtml: Ġlac sí seilḃ ar an micreafón agus ṫosaiġ sí ag canaḋShe got hold of the microphone and started singing.

result.eng: The man got a college education.
result.ga: Fuair an fear foghlaim coláiste
result.orig: Fuair an fear foghlaim coláiste
result.html: Fuair an fear foghlaim coláisteThe man got a college education.
result.ponchtml: Fuair an fear foġlaim coláisteThe man got a college education.

result.eng: He got a lump in his throat.
result.ga: Chruinnigh cnap i mbéal a ghoile
result.orig: Chruinnigh cnap i mbéal a ghoile
result.html: Chruinnigh cnap i mbéal a ghoileHe got a lump in his throat.
result.ponchtml: Ċruinniġ cnap i mbéal a ġoileHe got a lump in his throat.

result.eng: He got close enough to him to talk.
result.ga: Tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dó
result.orig: Tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dó
result.html: Tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dóHe got close enough to him to talk.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sé fá ḟad cainte dóHe got close enough to him to talk.

result.eng: Have you got enough? {after beating}
result.ga: An bhfuil do sháith agat
result.orig: An bhfuil do sháith agat
result.html: An bhfuil do sháith agatHave you got enough? {after beating}
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil do ẛáiṫ agatHave you got enough? {after beating}

result.eng: A little while after it got dark...

result.orig: Tamall beag i ndiaidh a ghabháil ó sholas dó
result.html: Tamall beag i ndiaidh a ghabháil ó sholas dóA little while after it got dark...
